Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue trains bypassing UIC Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at UIC Halsted due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at UIC Halsted due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: O'Hare- bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare- bound Blue  Line trains are running w/residual delays following  earlier police activity at UIC- Halsted.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- bound Blue  Line trains are running w/residual delays following  earlier police activity at UIC- Halsted. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
